import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./Salary.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL;const Salary=()=>{const[salaryData,setSalaryData]=useState([]);const[formData,setFormData]=useState({employee_id:'',name:'',bank:'',accountNo:'',ifsc:'',branch:'',daysWorked:'',wagePerDay:''});const[editingId,setEditingId]=useState(null);const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{fetchSalary();},[]);const fetchSalary=()=>{axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/salary`).then(res=>setSalaryData(res.data)).catch(err=>console.error(err));};const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(editingId){const confirmUpdate=window.confirm("Are you sure you want to update this employee's details?");if(!confirmUpdate)return;try{await axios.put(`${API_BASE_URL}/salary/${editingId}`,formData);}catch(err){console.error('Error updating salary:',err);}}else{// Prevent duplicates
const exists=salaryData.find(emp=>emp.employee_id===formData.employee_id);if(exists){window.alert("Employee ID already exists!");return;}try{await
